dcterms:description: A rich collection of neural and behavioral data recorded from nonhuman primates engaged in a random target reaching task, where subjects control a ticker to move a computer cursor and reach a series of randomly distributed targets. Neural activities from the primary motor cortex (M1) and primary sensory cortex (S1) are collected using a Utah array, along with kinematic measurements of the subject's hand trajectories.
dcterms:title: Neural and behavioral data from nonhuman primates engaged in a random target reaching task
